items.name: HP Pavilion 15-cs0051wm 15.6 Touchscreen Laptop, Windows 10 Home, Intel Core i5-8250U Processor, 8GB SDRAM Memory, 16GB Intel®Optane Memory, 1TB Hard Drive, Pale Gold
items.shortDescription: Work. Write. Play. Naturally. A durable 360-degree geared hinge gets you in the perfect position to work, write, watch, and play. With the latest technology and an ultrathin and light design, this powerful PC is the one device for everything you're into. Full HD Micro-edge touch display, Dual HP speakers, HP Audio Boost, and tuning by B PLAY deliver a rich, authentic audio and video experience. All your activities become easier and faster than before with the 8th Generation Intel® Core™ i5-8250U Processor and Intel®Optane™ memory*,**. Intel®Optane™ gives you near SSD performance without sacrificing the storage of your traditional hard drive. This smart system accelerator learns from your everyday computing and helps your performance—making everything fast, smooth, and responsive.
items.longDescription: <p>• Operating system: Windows 10 Home</p><p>• Processor: 8th Generation Intel® Core™ i5-8250U Processor</p><p>• Display: 15.6-inch diagonal HD SVA BrightView micro-edge WLED-backlit touchscreen (1366 x 768)</p><p>• Memory: 8 GB DDR4-2400 SDRAM 16 GB Intel® Optane™ memory</p><p>• Internal storage: 1 TB 5400 rpm SATA</p><p>• Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 620</p><p>• Audio: B&O PLAY with dual speakers</p><p>• Battery life: Up to 9 hours (mixed usage) Up to 7 hours and 15 minutes (video playback) Up to 6 hours and 15 minutes (wireless streaming)</p><p>• Wireless: Intel® 802.11b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth® 4.2 Combo</p><p>• Webcam: Front-facing HP Wide Vision HD Webcam with integrated dual array digital microphones</p><p>• Product weight: 4.25 lb<br></p>

items.name: HP 15-da053wm 15.6" Touch Laptop, Windows 10 Home, Intel Core i5-8250U Processor, 4GB SDRAM Memory, 16GB IntelOptane Memory, 1TB Hard Drive, DVD, Natural Silver
items.shortDescription: This 15.6” touchscreen laptop gives you responsive and reliable performance with the power to surf, stream, and do so much more with the 8th Generation Intel® Core™ i5-8250U Processor and Intel®Optane™ memory*,**. Intel®Optane™ gives you near SSD performance without sacrificing the storage of your traditional hard drive. This smart system accelerator learns from your everyday computing and helps your performance—making everything fast, smooth, and responsive. A sleek and stylish design makes this eye-catching laptop easy to take anywhere. With its beautiful brushed keyboard and color-matched hinge, the smartly designed HP laptop looks as good as it performs.
items.longDescription: <p><strong>Key Features and Benefits</strong></p><p> </p><ul><li>Windows 10 Home</li><li>15.6-inch diagonal HD SVA WLED-backlit touchscreen (1366x768) display </li><li>8th Generation Intel Core i5-8250U Processor</li><li>4 GB DDR4-2400 SDRAM (1 x 4 GB); 16 GB Intel Optane memory*,**</li><li>1 TB 5400 rpm SATA Hard Drive</li><li>DVD-Writer</li><li>Intel UHD Graphics 620</li><li>Up to 10 hours and 15 minutes (mixed usage) battery life</li><li>Intel 802.11b/g/n/ac (1x1) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 4.2 Combo</li><li>External ports include 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1, 1 USB 2.0, 1 HDMI, 1 RJ-45, 1 Headphone/microphone combo</li><li>Front-facing HP TrueVision HD Webcam with integrated digital microphone</li><li>HP Fast Charge: Go from 0 to 50% charge in approximately 45 minutes</li><li>Only 4.60 lbs</li></ul><p> </p><p>*Intel Optane memory system acceleration does not replace or increase the DRAM in your system.</p><p>**Multi-core is designed to improve performance of certain software products. Not all customers or software applications will necessarily benefit from use of this technology. Performance and clock frequency will vary depending on application workload and your hardware and software configurations. Intels numbering, branding and/or naming is not a measurement of higher performance.</p>

items.name: Acer 15.6" Chromebook CB5-571-C4G4, Intel Celeron, 4GB Memory, 16GB Storage, Chrome OS - White
items.shortDescription: The Acer Chromebook 15 is the biggest thing to happen to the Chromebook. It has a number of unique and defining features: it is the World's first Chromebook with a 15.6-inch Full HD wide viewing angle display, the first Chromebook with the latest Intel processor based on Broadwell micro-architecture, and it uses the new dual-band 802.11ac wireless technology. It all adds up to the right mix of features to make you think bigger and reimagine what’s possible with a Chromebook.

Powerful latest generation Intel processing, plus plenty of memory, guarantee lightning-fast responsiveness. Run multiple programs simultaneously, and transition seamlessly between web tabs, you'll be able to multi-task with ease. The IdeaPad 320 offers High-Definition resolution on a brilliant 15.6-inch display. And with anti-glare technology, you'll enjoy true visual clarity when you watch movies, browse the web and more.
